# Conjure Ice Beast V (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Creation Spells|creation]]) \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5,]] [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One or more conjured ice creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 91

This spell functions like *[[Conjure Ice Beast I (Spell)|conjure ice beast I]]**,* except that you can conjure one creature from the 5th-level list, two creatures of the same kind from the 4th-level list, or four creatures of the same kind from a lower-level list.
